files.description: Module for searching words in loaded Quran data and performing gematrical calculations. Provides various functions for text search in Quran data and computing numerical values based on Abjad numeral mapping.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Searches for a specific word in the Quran verses from the provided data, with an option for case-sensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search is case-sensitive. Defaults to False.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag for case sensitivity. Defaults to False.

parameters.description: Flag for case-sensitive search. Defaults to False.

parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The phrase to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) representing the starting verse.

parameters.description: Tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) representing the ending verse.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case-sensitive. Defaults to False.

functions.description: Counts occurrences of a specified word within a defined verse range, with optional case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to be counted.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: Tuple (surah_number, ayah_number) indicating the start of the range.

parameters.name: case_sensitive

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Searches for and returns verses that contain exactly a specified number of words.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The exact number of words a verse must have to be included.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Searches for verses whose word count is an exact multiple of a given number. Raises a ValueError if the multiple is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The number that verse word counts should be a multiple of. Must be non-zero.

functions.name: calculate_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the gematrical (Abjad) value of the provided text by summing the numerical values of Arabic letters.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: An Arabic word or phrase to calculate its gematrical value.

functions.name: search_words_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Searches for words in the Quran data that have a specified gematrical value, returning each matching word with its location.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The gematrical value to match.

functions.name: search_word_groups_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Searches for verses where a word group has a gematrical value matching the target value. The function returns verses only if the computed gematrical value of the group equals the target.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The phrase to search for.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the search should be case-sensitive. Defaults to False.

functions.name: calculate_surah_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the total gematrical value of all words within a specified Surah.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number for which to compute the gematrical value.

functions.name: calculate_verse_range_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the cumulative gematrical value for verses within a specified overall verse range.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: start_verse_num
parameters.description: The starting overall verse number (inclusive).

parameters.name: end_verse_num
parameters.description: The ending overall verse number (inclusive).

functions.name: calculate_quran_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculates the total gematrical value of the entire Quran by summing the values of all words in every verse.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

functions.name: search_word_at_position
functions.description: Searches for verses where the specified word appears at the given (1-indexed) position within the verse text.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The 1-indexed position in the verse where the word should appear.

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran search application. It loads Quran data and performs various search operations using functions from the quran_search module, then prints the results.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function to load Quran data and perform search operations. It demonstrates functionalities including word search, word group search, verse range queries, word count based searches, and gematrical value calculations, with results printed to the console.
